My good friend and awesome sound engineer Richard Kemp has recently discovered that some young whippersnapper in New York has shamelessly ripped off his website. Not only has he had the cheek to rip him off, he’s also done a p**s poor job of it. I mean, come on, if you’re going to copy someone at least do it well! Kemp’s original is well though out, and he’s obviously spent some time on it - Creating a nice logo, and writing some really nice content. Then along comes RK Audio USA and WHAM! Looks like he just couldn’t be bothered. To be honest, there’s probably not a lot he can do about this, other than bask in the satisfaction that this other guy’s stuff is turd. Gutted.
